system.description: When you examine an interesting object, roll with SPIRIT.

miss.label: Miss
miss.value: On a miss, ask 1, but the answers you get overwhelm you; take -1 ongoing for the scene.

weak-hit.label: Weak Hit
weak-hit.value:
On a hit, ask the MC questions from the list below.

On a 7-9, ask 1:

strong-hit.label: Strong Hit
strong-hit.value:
On a hit, ask the MC questions from the list below.

On a 10+, ask 3:

system.choices:
• what is the history of this object?
  • what bans, wards, or limits are attached to this object?
  • where does this object belong?
  • what secrets or mysteries has this object been privy to?
  • what strong emotions have most recently been near this object?
